data.title: Stonehage Fleming
data.text:
Ian is a Partner in our Family Office International, and was previously the Head of the officeâ€™s Internal Audit & Compliance division.

Ian joined the Stonehage Fleming in 2001 after working for ten years as a banker in the UK and Jersey for Barclays Plc and two years with the Jersey Financial Services Commission, gaining experience in Compliance and Operational procedures. Ian is a Fellow of the Chartered Institute of Bankers and holds a Bachelor of Science (Honours) degree in Financial Services from the IFS School of Finance.
